name: The Brittle Epoch
description:
A short walking narrative for people who enjoy relaxed exploration. In this experience you will walk the environment in first person listening to a narrative that is triggered in certain areas. It is less a game and more a short narrative artwork.

A group of children are brought by a singularity AI to their new home in an abandoned subdivision. This story follows two of the girls, Flutter and Juniper, who explore the houses during a winter storm, interpreting what they find within. This is a immersive short story (one hour) that is part two of a trilogy. Part one is seen through a machinima video. It is a chapter in a larger interconnected narrative I am creating.
